Silver Dental Fillings Did you know that silver fillings called "amalgam" contain up to 50% mercury? Over time, these fillings break down, gradually releasing mercury into the body. You can get rid of these fillings; however, use extreme care in doing so because the process is tedious. Holistic Dentists are prepared in strategies to securely expel these fillings. Pesticide Residue Pesticides often contain mercury, lead, and arsenic. Pesticides are used on a majority of foods that are not organic. Purchasing organic food is the best way to avoid this.
